desc: Japanese snacks paired with craft beer, sake, shochu, matcha, tea. Enjoy authentic otsumami beer snacks like our Rayu Senbei chili oil rice crackers and Wasabi Shoyu Mayonnaise savory rice bites. Share tasty bar snacks with your drinking buddies. Drinking Buddy Artisan Snacks make the best party food, so order yours!

layout.text: Think outside the bag of chips.

Artisanal Japanese snacks paired with
your favorite beverage
